storyTitle: As Manager, I want to create tasks with detailed information to achieve clear task delegation

testCases.title: Validate successful task creation with valid input
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
Manager has authorization to create tasks
At least one employee exists in the system to assign tasks
Database is accessible and operational
Task creation page is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to task creation page by clicking on 'Create Task' button or menu option
steps.expectedResult: Task creation form is displayed with all mandatory fields including task title, description, deadline, priority dropdown, and assignee selection list

steps.action: Enter valid task title in the title field (e.g., 'Complete Q4 Report')
steps.expectedResult: Task title is accepted and displayed in the input field without any validation errors

steps.action: Enter valid task description in the description field (e.g., 'Prepare and submit the quarterly financial report including all departmental expenses')
steps.expectedResult: Task description is accepted and displayed in the text area without any validation errors

steps.action: Select a future deadline date and time using the date/time picker (e.g., current date + 7 days)
steps.expectedResult: Deadline is accepted and displayed in the deadline field without any validation errors

steps.action: Select priority level from the priority dropdown (e.g., 'High', 'Medium', or 'Low')
steps.expectedResult: Selected priority is displayed in the dropdown field without any validation errors

steps.action: Select one or more employees from the assignee selection list
steps.expectedResult: Selected employees are highlighted and displayed in the assignee field without any validation errors

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button to submit the task creation form
steps.expectedResult: Task is created successfully, saved to the database, and a confirmation message is displayed (e.g., 'Task created successfully') with task details including title, assignees, deadline, and priority

postconditions: Task is saved in the database with all entered details
Task appears in the task list with correct information
Selected employees are linked to the task as assignees
Manager remains on confirmation page or is redirected to task list
System logs the task creation activity

testCases.title: Verify rejection of task creation with missing mandatory fields
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
Manager has authorization to create tasks
Task creation page is accessible
Database is accessible and operational

steps.action: Navigate to task creation page by clicking on 'Create Task' button or menu option
steps.expectedResult: Task creation form is displayed with all mandatory fields including task title, description, deadline, priority, and assignee selection

steps.action: Leave the task title field empty
steps.expectedResult: Task title field remains empty without any pre-filled data

steps.action: Leave the task description field empty
steps.expectedResult: Task description field remains empty without any pre-filled data

steps.action: Leave the deadline field empty without selecting any date
steps.expectedResult: Deadline field remains empty without any default date

steps.action: Leave the priority field unselected or at default state
steps.expectedResult: Priority field shows no selection or default placeholder

steps.action: Leave the assignee selection empty without selecting any employee
steps.expectedResult: No employees are selected in the assignee field

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button to attempt form submission
steps.expectedResult: Validation errors are displayed for each missing mandatory field with clear error messages (e.g., 'Task title is required', 'Description is required', 'Deadline is required', 'Priority is required', 'At least one assignee is required')

steps.action: Verify that the form submission is blocked
steps.expectedResult: Form is not submitted, no task is created in the database, and user remains on the task creation page with validation errors visible

steps.action: Fill in one mandatory field (e.g., task title) and attempt to submit again
steps.expectedResult: Validation errors are still displayed for remaining empty mandatory fields, and submission is blocked until all mandatory fields are completed

postconditions: No task is created in the database
User remains on the task creation page
All validation error messages are visible
Form data entered by user is retained (not cleared)
No system errors or crashes occur

testCases.title: Test validation for deadline in the past
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
Manager has authorization to create tasks
Task creation page is accessible
System date and time are correctly configured
Database is accessible and operational

steps.action: Navigate to task creation page by clicking on 'Create Task' button or menu option
steps.expectedResult: Task creation form is displayed with all fields including the deadline date/time picker

steps.action: Enter valid data in task title field (e.g., 'Review Documentation')
steps.expectedResult: Task title is accepted and displayed in the input field

steps.action: Enter valid data in task description field (e.g., 'Review and update project documentation')
steps.expectedResult: Task description is accepted and displayed in the text area

steps.action: Select a priority level from the priority dropdown (e.g., 'Medium')
steps.expectedResult: Selected priority is displayed in the dropdown field

steps.action: Select at least one employee from the assignee selection list
steps.expectedResult: Selected employee is highlighted and displayed in the assignee field

steps.action: Enter or select a deadline date/time that is in the past (e.g., yesterday's date or current date with past time)
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message is displayed immediately or upon field blur indicating invalid deadline (e.g., 'Deadline cannot be in the past' or 'Please select a future date and time')

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button to attempt form submission with past deadline
steps.expectedResult: Form submission is blocked, validation error message is prominently displayed for the deadline field, and no task is created

steps.action: Correct the deadline by selecting a future date and time (e.g., current date + 3 days)
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message disappears, deadline field shows the valid future date/time, and no validation errors are displayed

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button again with corrected deadline
steps.expectedResult: Form is submitted successfully, task is created, and confirmation message is displayed

postconditions: No task is created with past deadline
Task is successfully created only after deadline is corrected to future date
Final task in database has valid future deadline
User receives appropriate feedback for both error and success states
System maintains data integrity by preventing invalid deadline entries

storyTitle: As Manager, I want to assign tasks to multiple employees to achieve efficient workload distribution

testCases.title: Validate task creation with multiple assignees
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
Manager has authorization to create and assign tasks
At least three employees exist in the system for multi-selection testing
Task creation page supports multi-select functionality for assignees
Database is accessible and operational

steps.action: Navigate to task creation page by clicking on 'Create Task' button or menu option
steps.expectedResult: Task creation form is displayed with all fields including a multi-select assignee field showing list of available employees

steps.action: Enter valid task title in the title field (e.g., 'Team Training Session')
steps.expectedResult: Task title is accepted and displayed in the input field

steps.action: Enter valid task description in the description field (e.g., 'Attend mandatory safety training session')
steps.expectedResult: Task description is accepted and displayed in the text area

steps.action: Select a future deadline date and time using the date/time picker
steps.expectedResult: Deadline is accepted and displayed in the deadline field

steps.action: Select priority level from the priority dropdown (e.g., 'High')
steps.expectedResult: Selected priority is displayed in the dropdown field

steps.action: Select the first employee from the assignee list by clicking or checking the selection box
steps.expectedResult: First employee is highlighted/checked and displayed in the selected assignees area

steps.action: Select the second employee from the assignee list by clicking or checking the selection box
steps.expectedResult: Second employee is highlighted/checked and both selected employees are displayed in the selected assignees area

steps.action: Select the third employee from the assignee list by clicking or checking the selection box
steps.expectedResult: Third employee is highlighted/checked and all three selected employees are displayed correctly in the selected assignees area with their names visible

steps.action: Verify that all selected employees are visible in the assignee display area
steps.expectedResult: All three selected employees are clearly displayed with their names, and the count of assignees is accurate

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button to submit the task creation form
steps.expectedResult: Task is created successfully with all three assignees linked, and a confirmation message is displayed listing all assigned employees (e.g., 'Task created successfully and assigned to: Employee1, Employee2, Employee3')

steps.action: Verify the task details in the confirmation message or task list
steps.expectedResult: Task appears with all three assignees correctly linked and displayed in the task details

postconditions: Task is saved in the database with all entered details
All three selected employees are correctly linked to the task in the database
Task appears in the task list showing multiple assignees
Each assigned employee has the task associated with their account
Confirmation message displays all assignee names
System logs the task creation with multiple assignees

testCases.title: Verify validation error when no assignee selected
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role
Manager has authorization to create tasks
At least one employee exists in the system
Task creation page is accessible
Database is accessible and operational

steps.action: Navigate to task creation page by clicking on 'Create Task' button or menu option
steps.expectedResult: Task creation form is displayed with all fields including the assignee selection field showing list of available employees

steps.action: Enter valid task title in the title field (e.g., 'Database Backup')
steps.expectedResult: Task title is accepted and displayed in the input field

steps.action: Enter valid task description in the description field (e.g., 'Perform weekly database backup and verification')
steps.expectedResult: Task description is accepted and displayed in the text area

steps.action: Select a future deadline date and time using the date/time picker
steps.expectedResult: Deadline is accepted and displayed in the deadline field

steps.action: Select priority level from the priority dropdown (e.g., 'Medium')
steps.expectedResult: Selected priority is displayed in the dropdown field

steps.action: Verify that no employee is selected in the assignee field (leave assignee selection empty)
steps.expectedResult: Assignee field shows no selected employees, selection area is empty or shows placeholder text

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button to attempt form submission without selecting any assignee
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message is displayed indicating that at least one assignee is required (e.g., 'Please select at least one assignee' or 'Assignee is required')

steps.action: Verify that the form submission is blocked
steps.expectedResult: Form is not submitted, no task is created in the database, and user remains on the task creation page with the validation error visible

steps.action: Select one employee from the assignee list by clicking or checking the selection box
steps.expectedResult: Selected employee is highlighted/checked and displayed in the selected assignees area, validation error message disappears

steps.action: Click the 'Submit' or 'Create Task' button again to resubmit the form with an assignee selected
steps.expectedResult: Form submits successfully, task is created with the selected assignee, and confirmation message is displayed

postconditions: No task is created when no assignee is selected
Task is successfully created only after at least one assignee is selected
Final task in database has at least one assignee linked
User receives appropriate validation feedback
System maintains data integrity by enforcing assignee requirement
All other entered form data is retained during validation error state
